Dear PlanetSpark Team,

I am writing to inform you of ongoing issues we have been experiencing with your system, specifically regarding the video upload functionality in the performance classes. Over the past several weeks, we have consistently faced difficulties uploading videos. Despite multiple attempts, each video, all under one minute in length, fails to upload, even though your system ostensibly supports videos up to three minutes.

This issue is critical as the ability to upload and review performance videos is a primary feature we rely on. It is causing significant disruption to our educational activities. Additionally, if the platform is intended to restrict videos to one minute, I suggest modifying the system to stop recording at the one-minute mark. This would prevent any confusion and ensure that children do not record beyond the supported duration.

We request your immediate attention to this matter. Please address this issue as soon as possible to avoid further inconvenience.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this urgent issue.

Best regards,

Nirmalee

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to bring to your attention a concerning matter regarding my recent interaction with your center.
On 14th March I received communication from Ankit at your PLANT SPARK sturdy centre, who requested an upfront payment of 7000 INR assuring me that my EMIs would commence after a two-month grace period following my confirmation. I complied with the request and initiated a bank ECS as instructed.
To my dismay, the amount has already begun deductions from my account, despite the promised grace period. This situation raises serious concerns about the integrity of the communication and the legitimacy of the transaction.
Upon reflection and subsequent investigation, it has become apparent that I have been misled and subjected to fraudulent practices. I deeply regret any misunderstanding that may have occurred, but I am left with no choice but to bring this matter to your attention.
I urge you to investigate this incident promptly and take the necessary actions to rectify the situation. Furthermore, I request a full refund of the amount deducted from my account and the cessation of any further deductions also stops my ECS.

I trust that you will treat this matter with the urgency and seriousness it deserves. Please feel free to contact me at 9013840603 to discuss this matter further and provide any additional information you may require.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,

Dear Planet spark,

I am writing to bring to your attention a concerning matter regarding our child's experience as a new student at Planet Spark. We enrolled our child in your practice/performance class with high hopes for their academic and personal development. However, we have encountered significant challenges that require your urgent attention and resolution.

Our child, MOULIK, has been struggling to effectively engage and learn in the class due to the teaching methodology employed by the instructor. The primary issue we have identified is that the teacher exclusively communicates in fluent English, which our child struggles to comprehend fully. Despite our child's earnest efforts to understand, they often find themselves unable to follow the instructions and grasp the concepts being taught.

Moreover, we have observed that the teacher tends to favor students who are already proficient in English communication. Instead of providing necessary support and encouragement to all students, she selectively interacts with those who are fluent speakers, leaving others, including our child, feeling neglected and demotivated.

Furthermore, when our child attempts to participate or seek clarification, the teacher often dismisses them with curt responses or ignores their inquiries altogether. It is disheartening to see our child's enthusiasm wane as a result of the teacher's indifference and lack of inclusive teaching practices.

We firmly believe that every student, regardless of their proficiency level in English or any other subject, deserves equal opportunities to learn and thrive in your esteemed institution. However, the current teaching approach employed in our child's class falls short of meeting this fundamental principle.

Therefore, we kindly request that immediate measures be taken to address the following concerns:

1. Implement inclusive teaching strategies that cater to the diverse needs and abilities of all students, including those who may require additional support in English comprehension.
2. Encourage open communication and foster a supportive learning environment where every student feels valued and empowered to participate actively.
3. Provide ongoing training and support to instructors to enhance their ability to effectively engage with students from diverse linguistic and cultural backgrounds.

We trust that you will take our concerns seriously and take prompt action to rectify the situation. As parents deeply invested in our child's education and well-being, we are committed to working collaboratively with you to ensure that Planet Spark remains a nurturing and inclusive learning environment for all students.

We appreciate your attention to this matter and look forward to a positive resolution.

Sincerely,

PAWAN KUMAR 
FATHER OF MOULIK
